about.aboutText: After 9 years of goods and loyal service in bakery, I decided to change profession, especially because of the frantic rythm. Web development seemed like a good choice to me because I have been interested in it for a while and I want to stay in a creative field.
about.hobbiesText: Apart from web development, I like reading scientific journals, especially on space. I also enjoy the preparation of homemade breads and pizzas and the drawing. In addition, I devote some time to video games.

project.croustiEatText: First project carried out during my training, developed using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript, this website allows users to search for restaurants in the Bordeaux region by applying filters.
project.buyAPlanetAlt: Picture of Buy A Planet website
project.buyAPlanetText: Fictional Planet Sales Website, created as part of my training, this project helped me learn the basics of React, including props and states.
project.eshopText: During my training, I developed an e-commerce site in React, focused on data retrieval via fetch() and state management.  This project allowed me to strengthen my skills with React and API integration.
project.boarderlineText: Board Game Listing Website, project developed during my training to further explore React and learn how to fetch data from a REST API.
project.GeocodeText: GeoCode is a charging station management platform for electric vehicle users. It was developed as part of my training to learn how to use Express with MySQL.
